amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds be used to implement the provisions of subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code (relating to wage rate requirements; commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used to implement the provisions of subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code (relating to wage rate requirements; commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 278 (Roll no. 712).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
